author: joes
msg: Drop some debugging logs, and do a bit more refactoring (cut down on the internal apreq_env* calls, some of which - especially apreq_env_request() - had unintended side-effects). Also bump apreq_env_magic_number to reflect the bugfixes made over the last 24 hours.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag
